fields.name: AddressPrefix
fields.description: The network used for global reach carved out from the original network block provided for the private cloud

fields.name: AuthorizationKey
fields.description: Authorization key from the peer express route used for the global reach connection

fields.name: CircuitConnectionStatus
fields.description: The connection status of the global reach connection

fields.name: ExpressRouteId
fields.description: The ID of the Private Cloud's ExpressRoute Circuit that is participating in the global reach connection

fields.name: PeerExpressRouteCircuit
fields.description: Identifier of the ExpressRoute Circuit to peer with in the global reach connection

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The state of the  ExpressRoute Circuit Authorization provisioning
